publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3636 Charlie Gordon: Free to Fly the Flagâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Our Lady of the Annunciation Primary School in Merrylee, Glasgow, on being awarded a green flag under the eco-schools programme; notes that the school did not have a flagpole from which to fly its green flag, and congratulates Centurion Signs Ltd, which supplied and installed a flagpole for the school free of charge. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Jamie McGrigor*, Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-3636 Free to Fly the Flag (lodged on 6 March 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Malcolm Chisholm*, James Kelly*, Trish Godman*, Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-3636 Free to Fly the Flag (lodged on 6 March 2009) Sarah Boyack*, Jamie Hepburn*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3636 Free to Fly the Flag (lodged on 6 March 2009) Mary Mulligan*
S3M-3636 Free to Fly the Flag (lodged on 6 March 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3636 Free to Fly the Flag (lodged on 6 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3636 Free to Fly the Flag (lodged on 6 March 2009) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-3636 Free to Fly the Flag (lodged on 6 March 2009) Angela Constance*
